name: BeerDash
description:
BeerDash is a First Person game where your goal is to successfully perform “Juoksu kaljat”. Run, Jump, and Slide to be the fastest and avoid being caught by the Guard. BeerDash Features:
  • Levels - every level is unique with the difficulty level increasing by level.
  • Timer - compete against your friends or try to beat your record.
  • Graphics - unique, stylized graphics.
NOTE this game is not meant to be taken as encouragement of any illegal activities Controls

WASD: Move

SHIFT: Run

SPACE: Jump/Climb

CTRL: Crouch/Slide

E: Pick up Beer

FAQ:

"What are "juoksukaljat"?

          - Juoksukaljat is when you are running past the register with beer without paying.

"Is the game in Finnish?"

          - No, everything to read in the game is in English.

If you have any questions or concerns feel free to leave them in the thread below.
